Entities.Name: Thyroid Nodule
Entities.Definition: Refers to various descriptions identifying thyroid nodules within ultrasound reports.

Entities.Name: Cervical Lymph Nodes
Entities.Definition: Mentions of cervical lymph nodes within ultrasound reports.

Entities.Name: Numeric Size
Entities.Definition: Numeric measurements of thyroid nodules typically given in centimeters.

Entities.Name: Quantitative Size
Entities.Definition: Descriptive size assessments of thyroid nodules.

Entities.Name: Laterality
Entities.Definition: Specifies the side of the thyroid gland where the nodule is located.

Entities.Name: Location
Entities.Definition: Describes more specific areas within the thyroid where nodules are located.

Entities.Name: Composition
Entities.Definition: Describes the makeup of thyroid nodules, whether solid or containing fluid.

Entities.Name: Echogenicity
Entities.Definition: Refers to the ultrasound appearance of thyroid nodules, indicating different tissue densities.

Entities.Name: Margins
Entities.Definition: Describes the edges or borders of thyroid nodules as seen on ultrasound.

Entities.Name: Shape
Entities.Definition: Describes the overall shape of thyroid nodules.

Entities.Name: Echogenic Foci
Entities.Definition: Refers to small reflective areas within the thyroid nodules indicating calcifications or other substances.

Entities.Name: Vascularity
Entities.Definition: Describes blood flow characteristics within thyroid nodules.

Entities.Name: TIRADS Score
Entities.Definition: Assessment of thyroid cancer risk based on ultrasound characteristics.

Entities.Name: Risk Description
Entities.Definition: Radiologist's assessment of malignancy risk based on ultrasound findings.

Entities.Name: Total Number of Nodules
Entities.Definition: Counts the total number of nodules observed in the thyroid ultrasound.

Dataset.Name: Thyroid Ultrasound Reports
Dataset.Details: Consists of 8,857 ultrasound reports containing detailed thyroid nodule characteristics, from which a sample of 500 reports was annotated for NLP model training and validation.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: No direct link provided; the guidelines were developed internally by the team of NLP researchers and thyroid specialists and were iteratively optimized during the annotation process.
